Salmon is an Uncommon fish found in the Ocean.
Salmon are visually known for their silver skin and streamlined bodies.

Head to Ocean (Deep Ocean).

Equip the Abyssal Specter Rod (or higher) and use Worm as bait.

Wait for Rain or Clear weather. Available during Spring or Winter.

A moderate catch that requires some preparation. Best sold to NPC for quick profit. Estimated earnings: ~45.4K C$/hr.
